biography: Olli, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, hails from Hirsala Golf and is known for his meticulous approach to the game. His dedication to emulating Bryson Dechambeau's power and precision is well-documented among his peers.

With eight past appearances, Olli is gearing up for his ninth showing at Hector Trophée 2025. Olli has secured the coveted Hector Trophée once, in addition to a Victor Trophy for best individual performance.

Known for his calm demeanor on the course, Olli's strategic mind and unwavering focus make him a formidable competitor in both the individual and pair formats of the tournament. Spectators can anticipate another strong performance from this seasoned player.
